extendedBio: Mohammed Makhlouf is a distinguished journalist with extensive experience in digital media and traditional journalism. He has gained rich experience through his work in various media institutions and has distinguished himself by his journalistic coverage of many local and international events. He actively contributes to training young journalists and transferring his practical experience to them, emphasizing the importance of adhering to professional ethics and accuracy in information transmission. He has conducted numerous workshops in journalistic editing and digital media.

Professor Safi Habib is a prominent academic figure in the field of Islamic studies and currently serves as the Director of the University Center of Naama. He has made notable contributions to the development of educational curricula and the enrichment of scientific research in the field of Islamic studies. He has participated in numerous local and international scientific conferences and has valuable publications in his field of specialization. He adopts a moderate approach in addressing Sharia issues, focusing on connecting Islamic sciences with contemporary developments.

Dr. Khalwati Mosaab is a distinguished legal expert who combines academic expertise and practical experience in the field of law. He holds a PhD in Law and has published research in peer-reviewed scientific journals. He has participated in drafting and developing numerous legal legislations and worked in the field of law practice for several years before devoting himself to academic work. He is particularly interested in human rights issues and constitutional law, and seeks to develop students' skills in legal research.
